title: (x) Dancing Dollies upright cursive serif and slab serif - Kursivschrift, Rosewood Fill {Yves}
content:
Hi all,

Does anybody recognise either of these?

Bonus question: Can anyone recommend some other cursive serifs similar to the face reading 'Dancing Dollies'?

Thanks in advance,  
Jez.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Font 1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150407020222/http:/typophile.com/files/Font%201.jpg) | 12.35 KB |
author: jezburrows

comments.content: Frankly I don't know any other face similar to Kursivschrift. It's a quite unique design. :^/
